episode_event_newyear_2023/4001_1001_010:
Hey, everyone! Thanks for coming to my new
year’s live show!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4001_1001_020:
If you couldn’t make it to the venue, I hope you
still tuned into the live stream!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4001_1001_030:
I’m super happy that so many people
are watching!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4001_1001_040: Lissi! Could you do a twirl?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4001_1001_050: Sure! Let’s all do it together!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4001_1001_080: Hehe! This live show is so fun, it’s like a dream!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4001_1001_090: Oh, I forgot! I’m not alone today!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4001_1001_100:
Let me introduce someone! This is my friend who
formed an idol unit with me...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_010:
Hey, Uncle Wall! I had a dream where I did a
new year’s live show!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_020:
It was so exciting, it would be a waste for it to
stay just a dream.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_030: That’s why I want to make this dream a reality!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_040: A new year’s live show... What a wonderful idea!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_050:
Let’s get everyone on Pasio involved and have lots
of people come and watch!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_060: Right?! If I were to name it...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_070:
How about “Let’s Have Fun Together! An
Exhilarating New Year’s Show!”?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_080:
That’s it! Leave the preparation and venue
operations to me!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_090: I’ll prepare the perfect stage for you!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_110:
Oh yeah! I’d love to have a special outfit for this
rare occasion!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_120:
You should visit Valerie, a famous designer
from Kalos.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_130:
She should be able to prepare the perfect outfit
for your show!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_150:
(In my dream, I formed an idol unit
with someone...)
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_160: (I didn’t mention it to Uncle Wall, but...)
episode_event_newyear_2023/4002_1001_170:
(It would be sooo wonderful if someone like that
really is out there!)
episode_event_newyear_2023/6801_1031_010:
I’m so excited for the new
year’s live show!
episode_event_newyear_2023/6801_1001_010:
In my dream, it was like my heart and my fans’
hearts were one and the same!
episode_event_newyear_2023/6801_1001_020: Let’s make this the best live show, Dawn!
episode_event_newyear_2023/6801_1001_030:
Yep! It’s nerve-racking to perform in front of
everyone, but...
episode_event_newyear_2023/6801_1001_040:
if I’m gonna do it, I wanna enjoy it
with everyone!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_010: What a beautiful dance. I love it!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_040:
We formed a sync pair because Oricorio’s dancing
stole my heart!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_050:
Oricorio changes its form based on the nectar
it drinks...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_060:
And I think each appearance is so gorgeous, just
like an idol!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_090: I heard you’re doing a live show soon!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_100: I am! I’m in the middle of preparing for it.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_110: So I came here to ask Valerie for a favor!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_120:
You need Valerie’s help? What kind of favor do
you need?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_130: I’d like her to make the outfits for my live show!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_150: I’m terribly sorry, but Valerie is very busy.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_160:
It’ll be difficult for her to take on a request without
advance notice...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_170: Oh, I guess that makes sense...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_180: Valerie is a very famous designer, after all...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_200: Could you show me your Rapidash, Lisia?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_210: Who, Dashie? Of course I can!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_220: A Rapidash from Galar... So handsome...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_230:
But its features and colors look different from
when I saw it in a book.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_240:
You’re right! I got Dashie from my fans since I’ve
been on Pasio.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_250:
I only found out later that it’s a rare color,
because I didn’t know much about Rapidash
from Galar!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_260: Did you say you’re doing a live show, Lisia?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_270: Would you let me design your outfit for the show?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_290: But, I do have one request.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_300:
In exchange for making your outfit, I want you and
Dawn to form an idol unit.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_320:
When Oricorio and Rapidash line up next to each
other, they’re so beautiful.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_330: Seeing that gave me an idea!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_340:
I’d love to see you two next to each other, dancing
in the outfits I design...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_350: So... I’m gonna form an idol unit with Dawn?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_380: You want me to be an idol...with Lisia...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_410: Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll be an idol!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_420: It’s important to try everything, right?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_430: So let’s go on stage together!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_450:
I’ll take care of the design. Could you make
them, Kali?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_470:
No, I’ll make it happen! I’ll be sure to meet your
expectations, Valerie!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4003_1001_490: I’ll name it “An Idol Duo Is Born!”
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_010:
That was a great lesson, Dawn! Your sense of
rhythm was perfect!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_020:
Thanks. Maybe my experience with Pokémon
contests is coming in handy.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_030:
My mom participates in contests back in
Sinnoh, so...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_040:
I’ve been practicing my performance so I can beat
my mom one day!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_050:
Oh really? I think the fruits of your training are
definitely showing!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_080: Whoa! There’re so many Lisia fans!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_090:
Everyone! I know this is sudden, but we’re gonna
have a new year’s live show soon!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_100:
It’s definitely, DEFINITELY gonna be a fun one, and
I’d be happy if everyone came!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_110:
(She must be tired from the lesson, but she’s
talking to her fans with the brightest smile...)
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_120: (This is what an idol is! Amazing, Lisia!)
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_130:
There was a crowd, so I came to see what
kind of skilled Trainer would be here, but...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_140: Turns out it’s just an idol.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_150:
What a disappointment... It doesn’t seem like
there’s any point in battling.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_160: What’s with you?! Showing up all of a sudden—
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_170:
Oh, really? We’ll see about that! I’ve been training
for Pokémon battles, too!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_180: I know! I’ll introduce my partner Pokémon!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_200: Huh, a Rapidash of a rare color. But my—
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_210: My fans from Galar gave me Dashie as a gift!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_230: My fans were the ones who named him, too!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_240:
I’m gonna live up to their expectations and work
hard for my next show!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_270: “Unique”? He said I’m one of a kind!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_280:
Speaking with you somehow just doesn’t work
for me.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_300:
*sigh* Nevermind. Good luck, I suppose, with
your idol activities.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_310: Thanks! Make sure to come to the live show!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_320: I don’t think he was supporting us...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4004_1001_350:
Let’s practice even more and make it the best
performance ever!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4005_1001_020:
The beauty of Lisia’s and Dawn’s partner Pokémon
is expressed so perfectly!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4005_1001_030:
I’ll leave you the rest, Kali. I need to rest for
a bit...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4005_1001_050:
Can I do it? Can I prepare this outfit without losing
any bit of beauty from the design?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4005_1001_060:
Wait... I can’t be cowardly! As Valerie’s student,
I’ve got to see this through!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4006_1101_010:
On the day of the live show, Lisia and Dawn
were rehearsing...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4006_1001_020:
That was wonderful! It’s coming together very
well, both of you!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4006_1001_030: Once we get the outfits, it’ll be perfect!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4006_1001_050:
But I’m kinda worried, since the outfits haven’t
arrived yet...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4006_1001_060:
It should be fine! Valerie and Kali will definitely
get them to us on time!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4006_1001_070: That’s right! Kali said she’d do her best as well!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4006_1101_080:
Apologies for the long wait. The show will
begin now.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_010: *pant pant* I have to deliver the outfits...quickly!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_040:
It’s crowded because there’re so many people
going to the show.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_050:
At this rate, I won’t be able to make it in time for
the show!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_070:
There’s a live show ahead, so that’s why
it’s crowded...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_090:
I have to get their outfits to them, but I don’t
have much time left...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_100:
Well, in that case, you should move them with a
Pokémon battle.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_120: Everyone’s looking forward to today’s show!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_130:
We can’t do anything that would ruin
the atmosphere!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_150:
I guess that makes sense considering the
enthusiasm I used to see during my
Gym Challenge.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_160:
Well then, allow me to give you a bit of a
helping hand...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_200:
Hey, did you just see someone flying through
the sky?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_210: Whoa! Is this part of the performance?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_220:
Making a person float over a short distance
is easy...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4007_1001_230:
when you’re the partner Pokémon of an elite
Trainer like me!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4008_1001_010: Both of you, please get ready to go soon!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4008_1001_030:
Yeah... It can’t be helped—the outfits won’t
change what we’re gonna do!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4008_1001_040: We can just wear the outfits at our next show!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4008_1001_050:
Yeah! Let’s sing our hearts out for Valerie and
Kali’s sake!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4008_1001_080: I’m sorry I’m late! Here’re your outfits!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4008_1001_110: Oh, wow! This outfit’s design matches Dashie!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4008_1001_120: I’m looking forward to the show, you two!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4008_1001_130: Alright! Let’s get out there and shine bright!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_020: Thank you for coming to our live show today!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_050: Today is the first live show with the two of us!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_060:
Once again, I present to you a special member of
our unit...Dawn!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_080:
I was afraid at first. I wondered if I could actually
be an idol...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_100: When I saw Lisia, who’s always shining bright...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_110:
it made me want to be like her and stand on the
same stage together and shine...
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_130: (Being in a unit is so much fun!)
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_180: Could you both do a twirl?
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_190: Sure thing! Let’s all do it together, everyone!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_240:
They’re having so much fun and truly enjoy being
idols from the bottom of their hearts.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_250: Those’re the feelings they’re sending me.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_260:
Me, too. Not to mention, the outfits you and
Valerie made are equally as elegant!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_270:
We have a special stage and the perfect outfits to
make our idols shine.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_280: It’s the best new year’s live show! Utterly Glorious!
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_300:
I suppose it wouldn’t be a terrible way to
burn some time.
episode_event_newyear_2023/4009_1001_320:
Let’s have an absolute blast and welcome the
new year with the best live show ever!
